data.text:
THE GARDEN OF RAMA.

Clarke, Arthur C. and Gentry Lee.

New York, Toronto, London, Sydney, Auckland: Bantam Books, [1991]. First edition. The third Rama book. A fine copy in a just about fine dust jacket with separation a lamination along left front edge at spine. (28734). Item #28734

Price: $25.00
